p.k: Have the Bears lost their survival instincts by living in the modern world? / Ice gets in a fight with a Roomba, Panda's life gets turned upside down when a mouse invades his room and Grizz gets stuck in a tree. / When Nom Nom shows up on the Bears' doorstep, dishevelled and deposed from his spot as cutest internet star after a meltdown, he enlists the Bears to help him regain his title. / This episode takes place when the Bears are young cubs! On their way through the desert, they come upon a giant warehouse and try to make this box-filled paradise their home.
